p: In conclusion, SARS-CoV-2 is a novel betacoronavirus currently causing a pandemic of unprecedented modern proportions. COVID-19 ranges from mild viral illness in most hosts to life-threatening disease in a subset of patients who develop hyperimmune inflammatory responses. Further studies aimed at unraveling the immune response in lung and peripheral blood will aid in understanding the risk of developing ARDS is based on preexisting conditions and not the virus itself.
